name: __ERigVMGraphNotifType
doc:
The Graph Notification Type is used to differentiate
between all of the changes that can happen within a graph.

NodeAdded: The graph has changed / a new graph has been picked (Subject == nullptr)
NodeRemoved: A node has been added to the graph (Subject == URigVMNode)
NodeSelected: A node has been removed from the graph (Subject == URigVMNode)
NodeDeselected: A node has been selected (Subject == URigVMNode)
NodeSelectionChanged: A node has been deselected (Subject == URigVMNode)
NodePositionChanged: The set of selected nodes has changed (Subject == nullptr)
NodeSizeChanged: A node's position has changed (Subject == URigVMNode)
NodeColorChanged: A node's size has changed (Subject == URigVMNode)
PinAdded: A node's color has changed (Subject == URigVMNode)
PinRemoved: A pin has been added to a given node (Subject == URigVMPin)
PinRenamed: A pin has been removed from a given node (Subject == URigVMPin)
PinExpansionChanged: A pin has been renamed (Subject == URigVMPin)
PinWatchedChanged: A pin's expansion state has changed(Subject == URigVMPin)
PinArraySizeChanged: A pin's watch state has changed (Subject == URigVMPin)
PinDefaultValueChanged: An array pin's size has changed (Subject == URigVMPin)
PinDirectionChanged: A pin's default value has changed (Subject == URigVMPin)
PinTypeChanged: A pin's direction has changed (Subject == URigVMPin)
PinIndexChanged: A pin's data type has changed (Subject == URigVMPin)
LinkAdded: A pin's index has changed (Subject == URigVMPin)
LinkRemoved: A link has been added (Subject == URigVMLink)
CommentTextChanged: A link has been removed (Subject == URigVMLink)
VariableAdded: A comment node's text has changed (Subject == URigVMCommentNode)
VariableRemoved: A variable has been added (Subject == URigVMVariableNode)
VariableRenamed: A variable has been removed (Subject == URigVMVariableNode)
InteractionBracketOpened: A variable has been renamed (Subject == URigVMVariableNode)
InteractionBracketClosed: A bracket has been opened (Subject == nullptr)
InteractionBracketCanceled: A bracket has been opened (Subject == nullptr)
PinBoundVariableChanged: A bracket has been canceled (Subject == nullptr)
NodeRenamed: A pin has been bound or unbound to / from a variable (Subject == URigVMPin)
NodeReferenceChanged: A node has been renamed in the graph (Subject == URigVMNode)
NodeCategoryChanged: A node has changed it's referenced function
NodeKeywordsChanged: A node's category has changed (Subject == URigVMNode)
NodeDescriptionChanged: A node's keywords have changed (Subject == URigVMNode)
VariableRemappingChanged: A node's description has changed (Subject == URigVMNode)
LibraryTemplateChanged: A function reference node's remapping has changed (Subject == URigVMFunctionReferenceNode)
FunctionAccessChanged: The definition of a library node's template has changed (Subject == URigVMLibraryNode)
Invalid: The function has been made public/private (Subject == URigVMLibraryNode)
